name: snakebite
description:
[...] And gods watched Orpheus mourn over his lover's corpse.

Moved by his music, they followed his journey through the depths of Hades, and his pact with the guardian of Hell.

"Walk forth without looking back and Eurydice shall be yours again. Cross her sight before leaving the underworld, and I shall take her for eternity."

rhythm game - keep your combo and your lover alive in the depths of Hell

arrow keys / wasd

CREDITS

code, tech art, vfx - nicolas ceriani
art - laura nadal
music - guilhem d'humières
